editedFacts.rooms: Dining room, Family room, Laundry room, Library, Master bath, Pantry, Sun room

response.homeDescription: Stately American Center Hall Foursquare c. 1897. Gracious entry foyer leads to east and west parlours. The west parlour has built-in bookshelves and a gas loge fireplace. The east parlour has a gas log fireplace and opens to the banquet-sized formal dining room. It features an antique crystal chandelier, decorative fireplace and a triple bay window overlooking the terrace and gardens. There is a fully functional kitchen that was updated in the 1980s awaiting your creative design. The staircase is grand and features oak woodwork with painted risers and a truly spectacular stained glass window at the landing. The master bedroom has a fully updated en-suite bath with heated tile floors and original built-ins. The guest bath is also newly remodeled and showcases top of the line finishes as well as heated floors. There are two additional guest bedrooms, a 2nd floor laundry and a 2nd floor sun room. The 3rd floor is enormous and has great potential for a home theatre or family room and a 4th bedroom. It's also plumbed so a future owner could easily add a full bath.
response.whatOwnerLoves: The American Foursquare is a classic design made for gracious living. This house has all charm and character that you could want and then some! It's priced to reflect the need for an updated kitchen and provides you with the opportunity to create the kitchen of your dreams.
